definition: to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims)/time/classifier for acts of a play/section or chapter (of a classic book)

sentences.english: I have some proprietary jars that cannot be uploaded to public repos.
sentences.chinese: 我无法上传到公开回购一些专有的罐子。

sentences.english: Thirdly, the paper briefly discusses the present situation of share repurchases.
sentences.chinese: 在文章最后对我国股份回购的现状进行了简单探讨。

sentences.english: The repurchase program goes into effect immediately, and is to be completed by mid-2014.
sentences.chinese: 股票回购计划立即生效，并将于2014年中期完成。

sentences.english: Now, most auction-rate securities held by retail investors will be repurchased.
sentences.chinese: 大部分由散户投资者持有的此类证券将会被回购。

sentences.english: Is SDTH trying to buyback some of the convertible notes at a discount now?
sentences.chinese: SDTH试图现在回购了一些折扣可换股票据吗？

sentences.english: Zero coupon repurchase convertible bond can resolve the question.
sentences.chinese: 而零息回购转债的发行便可以有效地解决这一问题。

sentences.english: The significance and role of share re-purchase …
sentences.chinese: 股票回购操作的意义和作用。

sentences.english: Fortunately, the repo market is unlikely to freeze up entirely.
sentences.chinese: 幸运的是，回购协议市场不大可能完全冻结。

sentences.english: Given conditions, shares repurchases can add company's value.
sentences.chinese: 一定条件下的回购可以增加公司的价值。

sentences.english: It even announced a share buy-back.
sentences.chinese: 它甚至还宣布了一笔股权回购。

sentences.english: The introduction of outright repo presents both an opportunity and a challenge for banks.
sentences.chinese: 买断式回购的推出，对银行来说既是机遇又是挑战。

sentences.english: The rate of repurchases has probably accelerated since then.
sentences.chinese: 此后，回购率可能有所加快。

sentences.english: Repurchasing stocks has a lot of positive function in the economic development.
sentences.chinese: 股份回购在经济发展中有许多积极作用。

sentences.english: Share buybacks have a mixed record of boosting company stock prices in the long run.
sentences.chinese: 长远来看，股份回购对提振公司股价的作用有好有坏。

sentences.english: I will provide simple videos talking about bargain properties and bank repos.
sentences.chinese: 我会提供有关物业及银行回购交易说简单的影片。

sentences.english: You do not want the repo man knockin at your door.
sentences.chinese: 你不想在你的门回购男子敲入。

definition: to undertake to purchase sth/to subscribe (to share issue)
to convert (an asset) into cash/to cash out
to dump (selling abroad more cheaply than cost price at home)
to fall due (loan etc)/to expire (visa etc)/to mature (investment bond etc)
consideration (in exchange for shares)/a quid pro quo
